info.title: Charity API
info.description: The Charity API allows third-party developers to search for and access details on supported charitable organizations.

get.description: This call is used to retrieve detailed information about supported charitable organizations. It allows users to retrieve the details for a specific charitable organization using its charity organization ID.

parameters.name: charity_org_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the charitable organization.

parameters.name: X-EBAY-C-MARKETPLACE-ID
parameters.description:
A header used to specify the eBay marketplace ID.

Valid Values: EBAY_GB and EBAY_US

165001.description: Invalid, missing or unsupported marketplace. Please refer to documentation.

165002.description: Charity Org Id is invalid or missing.

165000.description: There was a problem with an eBay internal system or process. Contact eBay developer support for assistance.

get.description:
This call is used to search for supported charitable organizations. It allows users to search for a specific charitable organization, or for multiple charitable organizations, from a particular charitable domain and/or geographical region, or by using search criteria.

The call returns paginated search results containing the charitable organizations that match the specified criteria.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
The number of items, from the result set, returned in a single page.

Valid Values: 1-100

Default: 20

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description:
The number of items that will be skipped in the result set. This is used with the limit field to control the pagination of the output.

For example, if the offset is set to 0 and the limit is set to 10, the method will retrieve items 1 through 10 from the list of items returned. If the offset is set to 10 and the limit is set to 10, the method will retrieve items 11 through 20 from the list of items returned.

Valid Values: 0-10,000

Default: 0

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A query string that matches the keywords in name, mission statement, or description.

parameters.name: registration_ids
parameters.description:
A comma-separated list of charitable organization registration IDs.

Note: Do not specify this parameter for query-based searches. Specify either the q or registration_ids parameter, but not both.

Maximum Limit: 20

parameters.name: X-EBAY-C-MARKETPLACE-ID
parameters.description:
A header used to specify the eBay marketplace ID.

Valid Values: EBAY_GB and EBAY_US

165001.description: Invalid, missing or unsupported marketplace. Please refer to documentation.

165003.description: The specified limit is invalid. Maximum value supported is 100.

165005.description: Please specify registration_ids OR query text for the search.

165000.description: There was a problem with an eBay internal system or process. Contact eBay developer support for assistance.
